features: Foam Mattress: Active mattress replacement system provides comfort and support with its decompressing properties.General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized from its compressed state.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding
Convenient Design: The system has a non-slip bottom and 4 corner straps to keep this home bedding secure; two side carry handles make lifting and placement easy
Durable Material: Removable Nylon stretch cover is fluid resistant, low shear and vapor permeable, helping protect the skin from friction and moisture
Specifications: 80 inches in length x 36 inches in width x 8 inches in height; weight capacity: 275 lbs
One Year Warranty: Buy with confidence from Drive Medical
body.description: The Drive Medical Decompressing Foam Mattress helps you sleep well in your hospital bed or regular bed. Its inner core is encased in a fire retardant barrier, meeting regulation 16 CFR 1633. A non-slip bottom and 4 corner straps keep the mattress securely in place. The design is compact and the two carry handles on the side make lifting and placement easier. Backed by a one-year limited warranty from Drive Medical, a leading brand of medical beds, bath safety products, and other medical goods for more than 20 years, you can purchase with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Drifting into Dreamland: A Blissful Bedtime Experience with the Drive Mattress
reviews.reviewText: The Drive Medical FoamQuick'n Easy Comfort Mattress in Blue is an absolute game-changer! I couldn't be happier with this purchase. The quality of sleep it has provided me is exceptional. The foam is both comfortable and supportive, offering the perfect balance for a restful night's sleep. Plus, it fits my bed perfectly and doesn't slip or slide around. The blue color adds a touch of style to my bedroom decor as well. I appreciate the durability and ease of maintenance; it's easy to clean and has held up exceptionally well over time. For anyone in search of a comfortable and reliable mattress, this one from Drive Medical is an outstanding choice that I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful memory foam mattress
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this mattress for my daughter who is Disabled and I incontinent. I love it because the value for the price that I pay is amazing I have bought two of these mattresses within the last eight years or so. The only reason why I replaced it. The first time is because my daughter is in continent and was having a lot of accidents and this mattress is fluid resistant but if fluids sit on the mattress for too long, then it can permeate that protective covering. I’ve learned to use another layer of protection underneath her sheets and that totally fix the problem. I love this mattress fits in her bed perfectly and it does not slide around. The covering can be removed and washed. It is actually very comfortable and I have definitely slept on it. My daughter sleeps amazingly on it every single night. If I ever need to replace her mattress, this is exactly the one that I’m going to buy every single time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed and well worth it!
reviews.reviewText: My husband has Parkinson’s Disease. He needed something firm and easy to maneuver himself in if necessary. He also likes a firm mattress. Lastly, this fit his hospital bed at home perfectly, and if any accidents this can be easily cleaned and sanitized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Mattress for Adjustable Hospital Beds
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my elderly mother who recently had a stroke and has issues with incontinence overnight. When the mattress came it was vacuum sealed in a box that was approximately 1x1x4ft. After opening the packaging the mattress needs some time to expand, in my case I let it sit for about 4 hours and it looked like it was ready.It fits perfectly on her adjustable hospital bed and it bends easily when the head or foot of the bed is adjusted. Since it is a foam mattress without coils inside any adjustable bed should work properly. It is a little thicker than a normal hospital mattress so you may need to adjust the height of the bed if it is for a person who has mobility issues. It also comes equipped with handles on the side, and the mattress itself is light, around 25lbs. This makes it easy to adjust or slide a person on and off or transfer them off the bed.The comfort is excellent for the money. My mother loves it and instead of waking up constantly throughout the night she is able to stay asleep. The interior consists of several layers of polyurethane foam in different densities so that it feels soft and conforms to the person laying on it, while at the same time providing a firm base of support. This means it will keep the spine in proper alignment and allow proper circulation while still feeling soft and comfortable.This is the best choice to replace a hospital mattress or use on an adjustable bed. For $130 you will not find anything that is more comfortable or sturdy in this price range. The foam construction means there are no coils to poke or prod you while asleep, and it provides proper support. It would even be great as a guest room mattress or for use on a daybed. All in all it is the most economical way to get a decent twin mattress without breaking the bank. 5/5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: If you have a loved one that has issues with incontinence this is a great item.Would work well as a dorm mattress, or to use if you run an Air B&B and cater to kids. It is easy to clean.It isn't the most comfortable mattress I have slept on, but it is so much sturdier and easier to clean than waterproof mattress pads.Overall would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with this purchase. I had an inflatable pressure point mattress but it stopped holding air and insurance won't replace it for another 2 years. The company wanted almost $200 just to come look at it so I decided to just purchase a new mattress instead, since it was cheaper than the service call. I wasn't expecting much for the price, but I'm completely satisfied. It really is a quick and easy setup. It came flat and vacuum sealed but once you cut the plastic off, it begins to rise almost instantly. I waited a couple of hours and then had it put on my bed. It fits my hospital bed frame perfectly. The twin xl sheets I have fit great. It doesn't slide around. Thicker than I expected it to be. It's firm yet comfortable. Wish I had purchased this sooner, now that I have it and I recommend it for sure. I have not gotten it wet yet, but it has an easy wipe cover. It's possible that liquid could soak through, but you're going to experience that with any mattress, even the inflatable. Use chucks if someone has incontinence, but if you don't have them available, I'm sure this mattress is much easier to clean than a lot of other options.
